response.original_title: Xicano Hardcore: A Mosh For Youth Documentary
response.overview: Hardcore is fast, aggressive music characterized by its do-it-yourself nature. Victor Campos is a Mexican-American educator in Southern California. He is the lead singer of the hardcore band BARRIO SLAM. In 2021, he started MOSH FOR YOUTH, a non-profit organization throwing hardcore concerts to raise scholarship money for students of East LA, Pomona, and San Bernardino.
response.title: Xicano Hardcore: A Mosh For Youth Documentary
